Some things I've built.

  • Amazon Explore

    Amazon Explore called for a presence-building, browser-based streaming UI for customers and an app and gimbal to deliver experiences for guides.

  • Amazon Explore for Groups

    After a successful launch of Amazon Explore, the focus shifted to bringing down the price by launching Amazon Explore for Groups.

  • Amazon Work Scheduling

    Amazon Logistics' 3rd-party delivery partners needed a driver scheduling tool that adhered to industry best-practices.

  • Amazon Dispatch

    Amazon's delivery partners needed a tool to track and monitor driver location, progress, route, and stop information.

  • Amazon Work Tracking

    Amazon needed a tool for delivery partners to submit hours, mileage, and route counts daily in order to get paid.

  • Coyote Howl Customer App

    Coyote needed a customer-focused mobile app to give shippers visibility and insight into their freight network.

  • Coyote LTL Quote

    A less than truckload (LTL) quoting and shipping tool so Coyote Logistics could remain competitive in the market.

  • Shuffl Marketing Site

    Website and branding for a small Slack app aimed to keep remote teams connected by pairing random employees up for lunch.

  • Coyote My Tasks

    A dashboard that presents Coyote customers with high level freight information, tasks and todo items, and a quick way to complete them.

  • Coyote TMS Platform

    Large web platform and application for shippers and trucking companies to manage freight.

  • Tech for Campaigns

    A sign-up form to collect volunteers' basic contact information, specific market expertise, and their technical background.

  • Barack Obama's Tumblr

    Desktop and mobile template designs for Barack Obama's 2012 reelection campaign's Tumblr page.

  • Bauer Latoza Studio

    Brochure and portfolio website for Chicago architecture firm specializing in historic preservation.

Although I'm not currently looking for freelance opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether for a potential project or just to say hi, please reach out!
